coalda.data
Class LabelAccess

  coalda.data.LabelAccess

public class LabelAccess
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
kesslewd Abstraction between the database and the GUI, gets the labels associated with featurevectors.

Field Detail

db

private DBAccess db
Loading of data from database.

allLabels

private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> allLabels
Hashmap for saving the label to a feature vector. Key is the feature vector ID, value is the appropriate label.

Constructor Detail

LabelAccess

public LabelAccess()
Constructor. Load the labels of all feature vectors.

LabelAccess

public LabelAccess(boolean doImport)
Constructor. If doImport is true, load the labels of all feature vectors. If doImport is false, no labels are loaded (use this for exporting labels).

Parameters:
doImport - Load labels or not.

LabelAccess

public LabelAccess(java.lang.String featureVectors)
Constructor. Load the labels of all feature vectors passed in the String. Feature vector IDs must be separated by spaces.

Parameters:
featureVectors - Load labels for these feature vectors.

LabelAccess

public LabelAccess(java.lang.String featureVectors,
                   boolean doImport)
Constructor. If doImport is true, load the labels of all feature vectors passed in the String. Feature vector IDs must be separated by spaces. If doImport is false, no labels are loaded (use this for exporting labels).

Parameters:
doImport - Load labels or not.
featureVectors - Load labels for these feature vectors.
Method Detail

getCoDisref

public int[] getCoDisref(java.lang.String featureVectors)
Method getCoDisref. Gets number of feature vectors out of the ones passed as a parameter that have already been labeled coreferent and disreferent. FV IDs must be separated by spaces.

Parameters:
featureVectors -
Returns:
Array[0] : number of coreferent fvs Array[1] : number of disreferent fvs

labelFVs

public void labelFVs(java.lang.String featureVectors,
                     int label,
                     int confidence)
Method labelFVs. Labels the feature vectors with the label and confidence value given. FV IDs must be separated by spaces. See Constants for possible values for label and confidence value.

Parameters:
featureVectors - The feature vectors to be labeled.
label - Which label to assign
confidence - Confidence value
